Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.18618891]Effects:H. contortus( IC50=2.01μM, IC99=6.73μM) and T. colubriformis(IC50=2.27μM, IC99=5.26μM).[Ref.18008336]Virus:HIV:inhibition the cytopathic effects of HIV-1 infection in cultured human T-lymphoblast (CEM-SS) cells(EC50=120 nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref:18081258] HD50=9.3 μM against human type A red blood cells.
Sequence Information.Function: Has anti-HIV activity. Cycloviolacins Y4 is more hemolytic than cycloviolacin Y1. PTM
